bug.author: NYcleaner
bug.description: cant use in ubuntu 16.04, i download linux1.2.2 and unzip , then click the labelImg , but without any reaction

comments.comment: You can try sudo ./labelImg I don't know why it can only run under root.
I think it is caused by me because I built the binary under root. How about changing the owner using chown?

使用超级用户，也就是root执行命令chmod 777 filename
At 2017-03-15 16:33:09, "darrenl" <notifications@github.com> wrote:
I think it is caused by me because I built the binary under root. How about change the owner using chown?

yes it is not working in linux 16.04 Segmentation fault (core dumped)
